titles.title: Supporting the designation of a week as "Extension Living Well Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committee.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 1/26/2005--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of a week as Extension Living Well Week. Encourages the people of the United States to take advantage of the educational opportunities that Extension Family and Consumer Sciences educators provide.
